String.string: The road leads in all directions, but your path is to the east.
You are doing better than I expected.
Retrieve obelisk shards from the {@linkcreature:13#301194#stonebeaks} at the northeastern part of the Tower Base.
Got all of the shards. Now, inspect the obelisk and repair it.
Climb up the vines to reach the Mathar Spire.
Use the flower's or potion's effect to jump off the cliff safely. Then report to Jorhon.
